abstract: The Boeing Company, seeking to win the reopened $35 billion Air Force tanker competition, said it needs more time to prepare its proposal.
snippet: The Boeing Company, seeking to win the reopened $35 billion Air Force tanker competition, said it needs more time to prepare its proposal.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company, seeking to win the reopened $35 billion Air Force tanker competition, said it was considering dropping out of the competition unless the Pentagon allowed the company up to six months to prepare its proposal.

headline.main: Boeing Seeks More Time for Bid
headline.print_headline: Boeing Seeks More Time for Bid
